1.0.0.name: wordpress/rf-twitterpost
1.0.0.description:
ATTENTION TWITTER POST USERS

On August 16th, 2010, Twitter killed their basic authentication API which was used by Twitter Post. In anticipation of this, we created a new service called leenk.me. If you want to continue publishing to your Twitter account whenever you publish a new post in WordPress, we recommend using the leenk.me WordPress plugin. RF Twitter Post will no longer work or be supported.
